title: Perfect roast turkey and stuffing
description: I love roasting turkey with the stuffing inside the cavity of the bird - after all, that’s why it’s called stuffing! It absorbs all the lovely turkey juices, creating a flavourful accompaniment to the Christmas roast. Trust me, you'll never go back to making stuffing in a separate tin again! Oven temperatures vary, so be sure to check your turkey is cooked through.For this recipe, you will need a piece of muslin cloth large enough to cover the turkey.
ingredients: 4.5-5.5kg/10-12lb whole turkey, gizzard, heart, wing tips and wishbone removed and reserved
flaked sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
2½ tbsp chopped mixed fresh herbs (parsley, chives, thyme, lemon balm, marjoram and sage)
1.2 litres/2 pints stock (see above, or chicken stock)
